channel.title: Configuration on Project Dovetail™ - Docs and Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Configuration on Project Dovetail™ - Docs and Tutorials

item.title: Environment variables
item.description: List of environment variables to configure the Dovetail™ engine Environment name Default value Info FLOGO_LOG_DTFORMAT “2006-01-02 15:04:05.000” Sets the log date and time format FLOGO_LOG_LEVEL “INFO” Sets the log level FLOGO_RUNNER_TYPE “POOLED” Sets the type of the runner FLOGO_RUNNER_WORKERS 5 Sets the number of workers FLOGO_RUNNER_QUEUE 50 Sets the runner queue size FLOGO_CONFIG_PATH “flogo.
